name: Coco
description: What is the project about? Our project is the #1 idle-game on Solana. What makes your project unique? We have a unique seasons-based approach to gamefi, with a team that has been building idle-games on the blockchain for almost 2 years. History of your project. We started 2 years ago, and have launched 2 idle-games on Solana. The Heist, our second title, was launched in April of 2023, with Season 2 being launched just a few days ago. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We just launched Season 2 of the game, so getting that underway. What can your token be used for? The token is used for in-game utility; buying cosmetics, upgrading character stats, crafting items, etc.
